RelatedSentence: Daniel Wani , a Sudanese man with U.S. citizenship , has returned to Sudan to try to save his wife 's life .
Meriam Ibrahim was sentenced to death because she is considered Muslim by Sudan 's courts , and her husband is Christian .
A court sentenced her to 100 lashings and death by hanging .
Gabriel said it is an emotional time .
The family hopes the U.S. government can help .
U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte has written to Secretary of State John Kerry , asking for Ibrahim to be granted political asylum .
IT NEVER DID THEY THINK THEY WOULD FIND THEMSELVES HERE FIGHTING TO SAVE HER LIFE .
I DO N'T KNOW WHAT TO DO .
YOU CAN NOT BELIEVE THAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN .
SENATOR KELLY AYOTTE HAS WRITTEN SECRETARY KERRY ASKING FOR MERRIAM TO BE GRANTED POLITICAL ASYLUM .
WE SHOULD ALL CARE ABOUT THAT .
